1894.verse: فَوَرَبِّكَ|So by your Lord,|130|190|9855$لَنَسْــَٔلَنَّهُمْ|surely We will question them|209|330|9856$أَجْمَعِينَ|all|95|155|1408$

1896.verse: فَٱصْدَعْ|So proclaim|96|105|9857$بِمَا|of what|71|89|43$تُؤْمَرُ|you are ordered|125|143|9858$وَأَعْرِضْ|and turn away|116|134|5924$عَنِ|from|54|72|1663$ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ|the polytheists.|124|133|990$

1897.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|150|120$كَفَيْنَـٰكَ|[We] are sufficient for you|197|305|9859$ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ|(against) the mockers|166|220|9860$

1898.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|110|20$يَجْعَلُونَ|set up|96|132|161$مَعَ|with|48|84|443$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|89|606$إِلَـٰهًا|god|61|97|1222$ءَاخَرَ‌ۚ|another.|76|112|9861$فَسَوْفَ|But soon|85|103|3931$يَعْلَمُونَ|they will come to know.|178|178|115$

1899.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|108|640$نَعْلَمُ|We know|80|116|3481$أَنَّكَ|that [you]|89|125|9862$يَضِيقُ|(is) straitened|114|150|9863$صَدْرُكَ|your breast|96|132|8398$بِمَا|by what|74|92|43$يَقُولُونَ|they say.|88|88|753$

1900.verse: فَسَبِّحْ|So glorify|82|91|9864$بِحَمْدِ|with the praise|119|136|9865$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|129|1322$وَكُن|and be|65|82|6821$مِّنَ|of|50|67|156$ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ|those who prostrate.|160|169|6265$

1902.verse: أَتَىٰٓ|Will come|82|96|9869$أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ|(the) command of Allah|175|202|4059$فَلَا|so (do) not|95|122|208$تَسْتَعْجِلُوهُ‌ۚ|(be) impatient for it.|156|183|9870$سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ|Glorified is He|109|122|1080$وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ|and Exalted (is) He|146|226|5903$عَمَّا|above what|98|257|724$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate.|123|202|7075$

1904.verse: خَلَقَ|He created|93|105|299$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|139|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth,|116|140|2280$بِٱلْحَقِّ‌ۚ|in truth.|78|102|692$تَعَـٰلَىٰ|Exalted is He|105|129|9874$عَمَّا|above what|98|110|724$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate.|123|123|7075$

1905.verse: خَلَقَ|He created|93|104|299$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ|the human kind|121|143|8037$مِن|from|50|72|53$نُّطْفَةٍ|a minute quantity of semen|202|224|9875$فَإِذَا|then behold,|103|125|1730$هُوَ|he|48|59|298$خَصِيمٌ|(is) an opponent|130|374|9876$مُّبِينٌ|clear.|66|310|1467$

1906.verse: وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمَ|And the cattle,|121|134|9877$خَلَقَهَا‌ۗ|He created them|131|158|9878$لَكُمْ|for you,|72|99|207$فِيهَا|in them|69|96|253$دِفْءٌ|(is) warmth|96|123|9879$وَمَنَـٰفِعُ|and benefits|102|115|1918$وَمِنْهَا|and from them|116|358|6331$تَأْكُلُونَ|you eat.|86|328|2892$

1907.verse: وَلَكُمْ|And for you|97|116|387$فِيهَا|in them|69|106|253$جَمَالٌ|(is) beauty|93|130|9880$حِينَ|when|62|99|5281$تُرِيحُونَ|you bring them in|135|172|9881$وَحِينَ|and when|84|102|1536$تَسْرَحُونَ|you take them out.|148|148|9882$

1893.verse: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.

1894.verse: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all

1895.verse: About what they used to do.

1896.verse: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.

1897.verse: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers

1898.verse: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.

1899.verse: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.

1900.verse: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].

1901.verse: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).

1902.verse: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.

1903.verse: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me."

1904.verse: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.

1905.verse: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary.

1906.verse: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.

1907.verse: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture].
